title: Deceased details
question: What are the details of the person who died?
questionName: The name of the person who died
deathCertificateHint: You should use the details from the death certificate.
firstName: First name and any middle names

firstName.required: Enter the first name of the person who died
firstName.invalid: Enter a valid first name - can only contain letters a to z, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

lastName.required: Enter the last name of the person who died
lastName.invalid: Enter a valid last name - can only contain letters a to z, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

dob-day.required: Enter the day they were born
dob-day.invalid: Enter a valid day of birth

dob-month.required: Enter the month they were born
dob-month.invalid: Enter a valid month of birth

dob-year.required: Enter the year they were born
dob-year.invalid: Enter a valid year of birth

dob-date.required: Enter the date they were born
dob-date.invalid: Enter a valid date of birth
dob-date.dateInFuture: Enter a date in the past
dob-date.dodBeforeDob: Enter a date of birth that is before the date of death

dod-day.invalid: Enter a valid day of death

dod-month.invalid: Enter a valid month of death

dod-year.invalid: Enter a valid year of death

dod-date.invalid: Enter a valid date of death
dod-date.dateInFuture: Enter a date in the past
dod-date.dodBeforeDob: Enter a date of death that is after the date of birth
